name: Inspiring Word
target: You or one ally in burst
effect: The target can spend a healing surge and regain an additional 1d6 hit points.
description: You call out to a wounded ally and offer inspiring words of courage and determination that helps that ally heal.

name: Commander's Strike
attack: An ally of your choice makes a melee basic attack against the target
effect: Ally's basic attack damage + your Intelligence modifier.
description: With a shout, you command an ally to attack.

name: Furious Smash
effect: Deal damage equal to your Strength modifier, and then choose one ally adjacent to either you or the target. This ally applies your Charisma modifier as a power bonus to the attack roll and damage roll of his or her next attack against the target. If the ally does not attack the target by the end of his or her next turn, the bonus is lost.
description: You slam your shield into your enemy, bash him with your weapon's haft, or drive your shoulder into his gut. Your attack doesn't do much damage-but your anger inspires your ally to match your ferocity.

name: Viper's Striker
effect: 1[W] Strength modifier damage. Effect: If the target shifts before the start of your next turn, it provokes an opportunity attack from an ally of your choice.
description: You trick your adversary into making a tactical error that gives your comrade a chance to strike.

name: Wolf Pack Tactics
effect: Special: Before you attack, you let one ally adjacent to either you or the target shift 1 square as a free action. 1[W] Strength modifier damage.
description: Step by step, you and your friends surround the enemy.

name: Guarding Attack
effect: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, one ally adjacent to either you or the target gains a +2 power bonus to AC against the target's attacks.
description: With a calculated strike, you knock your adversary off balance and grant your comrade-in-arms some protection against the villain's.

name: Hammer and Anvil
effect: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage. One ally adjacent to the target makes a melee basic attack against it as a free action. The ally adds your Charisma modifier to the damage.
description: You land a ringing blow against your foe, inspiring a nearby ally to stike a blow of his own.

name: Leaf on the Wind
effect: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. You or an ally adjacent to the target swaps places with the target.
description: Like a leaf caught in the autumn wind, your foe is driven by the flow of battle. Your fierce attacks force him to give ground.

name: Warlordâ€™s Favor
effect: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. One ally within 5 squares of you gains a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against the target until the end of your next turn. Tactical Presence: The bonus to attack rolls that you grant equals 1 + your Intelligence modifier.
description: With a calculated blow, you leave your adversary exposed to an imminent attack from on of your closest allies.

name: Bastion of Defenser
effect: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage. Allies within 5 squares of you gain a +1 power bonus to all defenses until the end of the encounter. Effect: Allies within 5 squares of you gain temporary hit points equal to 5 + your Charisma modifier

name: Lead the Attack
effect: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the end of the encounter, you and each ally within 5 squares of you gain a power bonus to attack rolls against the target equal to 1 + your Intelligence modifier. Miss: Until the end of the encounter, you and each ally within 5 squares of you gain a +1 power bonus to attack rolls against the target.
description: Under your direction, arrows hit their marks and blades drive home.

name: Pin the Foe
effect: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage. Effect: Until the end of the encounter, the target cannot shift if at least two of your allies (or you and one ally) are adjacent to it
description: No matter where your foe turns, one of your allies is waiting for him.

name: White Raven Onslaught
effect: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you slide an adjacent ally 1 square. Until the end of the encounter, whenever you or an ally within 10 squares of you makes a successful attack, the attacker slides an adjacent ally 1 square. Miss: Choose one ally within 10 squares. Until the end of the encounter, the ally slides an adjacent ally 1 square after making a successful attack.
description: You lead the way with a powerful attack, using your success to create an opportunity for one of your allies. Each of your comrades in turn seizes on your example and begins to display true teamwork.
